Text: Whats wrong? When I try to connect to a server it writes "You are in insecure mode.  You must restart before you can connect to secure servers." When i try creating a server with bots it writes "CD Key authentication invalid for internet servers." When I go to the achievements it writes "You must be logged in to Steam to unlock or view Achievements." Why am I getting this?
When I go to find servers it writes "Steam Beta must be running to make use of Find Servers."

to Auris147
Full of antivirus --> run updater --> run game --> enjoy.

to Auris147
Then i can't help you.
